SocialMediaPosting.headline: Ms. Elana Kriess’s Story - Pittsburgh Educator - TodayPGH
SocialMediaPosting.text:
“One Day, I would love for language learning to move up the priority list in education…”

– Ms. Elana Kriess, Elementary Spanish Educator @ https://www.todaypgh.com/story/2020/language-learning-prioritized-education/
